StaticSkill.DiscoveryMessage: You see a bundle of panties shrink-wrapped in the clothing store. One bag is open and you see a pair hanging out of it, almost as if it were trying to crawl away. You can't sense any human presence in the fabric so you conclude the position is just a coincidence. But just because this is a regular cloth pair, you get to wondering how a pair of human panties might feel...
StaticSkill.Description: Ever too lazy to run some laundry, or just need a pair of plain old panties here and now? This spell may solve that problem.
